description: Oak wood planks with horizontal plank construction and vertical wood grain

base_colors.note: Oak plank base colors with grain variation range

color_clamping.note: Ensure colors stay in valid brown range

generation_algorithm.step1: Calculate local pixel coordinates: pX_wp = globalX % 16, pY_wp = globalY % 16
generation_algorithm.step2: Start with oak base colors: finalR = 160, finalG = 130, finalB = 95
generation_algorithm.step4: Apply alternating plank variation: if plankY % 2 == 1, add (10,8,5)
generation_algorithm.step5: Generate wood grain: grainNoise = sin(pX_wp * 0.7 + plankY * 0.3) * 0.5 + cos(pX_wp * 0.4) * 0.3
generation_algorithm.step6: Apply grain adjustment with blue stability: grainAdjust = grainNoise * 12
generation_algorithm.step7: Apply horizontal plank separation lines: if pY_wp % 4 == 0 && pY_wp > 0, subtract (20,18,12)
generation_algorithm.step8: Clamp colors to brown range: r[80-200], g[60-170], b[40-130]
